Also, each link will be equipped with CDMA and TDM equipment to handle up to one vocoded voice or data at 2400 bps and/or several teletype channels under jamming conditions. Table 16-7 summarizes the links and channels to be provided in the NB European net and the WB Atlantic-European net by use of various types of earth ter­ minals.
